successes.title: XY Find It- The stylish iOS/Android Bluetooth tracking tag
successes.description: XY Find It is the most stylish, convenient, and affordable Bluetooth Tracking tag.

Pledges.description: Special Thanks - The XY team thanks you for your support on our project. We will also put your name on the special thanks page inside our app.
Find-It Early- Get a single XY tag in your choice of available colors at our early bird price. You've gotten in the door early, and for that, we thank you.
Find It - Your generosity gets you a single XY tag in your choice of available colors.
International Find-It Early- Get a single XY tag in your choice of available colors at our early bird price. You've gotten in the door early, and for that, we thank you.
Find It - Your generosity gets you a single XY tag in your choice of available colors.
International Find It - Your generosity gets you a single XY tag in your choice of available colors.
Find your Pet. Get an XY tag with an XY collar to easily place on your pet.
Early Bird Finder's 3 pack. Get a 3-pack of XY tags, one in white, one in black, and one in teal. Perfect to get you started at locating everything that matters.
Finder's 3 pack. Get a 3-pack of XY tags, one in white, one in black, and one in teal. Perfect to get you started at locating everything that matters.
Find All The Things First - Get all 7 colors in one convenient pack
Find All The Things - Get all 7 colors in one convenient pack

XY Beta. Get one of our exclusive 100 prototype tags  3D-printed from our office. We will start printing these tags as soon as we hit our goal, and will ship them out as soon as we can. You will also, of course, get an additional XY tag when we ship them.
All the XY you can eat! (early bird) - Get 10 XY tags for the very limited early bird price of $100!
All the XY you can eat! - Get 10 XY tags for anything and everything you want to keep track of.
Find-It Founder. Get the total XY package. 2 tags for your pets, and a 7 pack of XY tags.
Find Yourself. Get an XY tag that has been hand painted by Star Wars artist Lee Kohse. You can consult with him on the design, and anything reasonable will be painted.

Find XY. Fly to the XY office in San Diego, CA. Spend 2 nights in the city, check out the XY office, meet the team, play some Mortal Kombat with the office champion. Also, you will get an XY Beta tag, and 5 custom hand painted beacons by Lee Kohse. With this, you will have no problem finding everything. (US only)
